priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM COPD Findings About Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C122007

self.title: CDISC SDTM COPD Findings About Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the test codes that describe findings about a COPD event or intervention.
name: COPD Findings About Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM COPD Findings About Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: The total amount that a subject is exposed to over time.
The number of times an event, which is classified as mild, occurred.
The number of times an event, which is classified as moderate, occurred.
The number of times an event, which is classified as severe, occurred.
